title: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Comprehensive specialization covering the foundations of deep learning, including neural networks, optimization, and practical applications.

title: Convolutional Neural Networks
description: Specialized course focusing on convolutional neural networks for computer vision applications.

title: Sequence Models
description: Advanced course on sequence models including RNNs, LSTMs, and attention mechanisms for natural language processing.

title: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization
description: Focused on practical techniques for improving deep neural network performance through optimization and regularization strategies.

title: Structuring Machine Learning Projects
description: Strategic approach to machine learning project development, including error analysis and ML pipeline optimization.
